{"rule":"MORFOLOGIK_RULE_EN_GB","sentence":"^\\QCheck connections (no pins touching etc) with a multimeter (on continuity test mode)\nCheck SPI is sending to clock and data pins with oscilloscope\nYou can use the sketch spi_test to send a very simple repeated SPI signal to test.\\E$"}
